item.title: Removeing the Lost legacy quest tab
item.dc:creator: @ipkonpcp ipkonpcp
item.description:
@ipkonpcp wrote:

Ok first off there is tuts on google on how to add to quest tab in every single pi server so im not posting that. Secondly if u never used Lost Legacy and decide to flame me get a life seriously… This is all client sided make a back up because im not responible for you not following this guide correctly. Ok lets get started

  1. open your client and find RSinterface class inside search for “speical quest” without the quotes.

  2. remove this whole body of code public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){ RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(638); setChildren(7, Interface); addText(19155, " | | Lost Legacy | |", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addButton(19156, 1, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Server Info", 1); addSprite(19157, 5, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); addSprite(19158, 4, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); removeSomething(19156); addText(19159, "Pc Points:", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0); removeSomething(19159); setBounds(19155, 4, 2, 0, Interface); setBounds(19156, 170, 2, 1, Interface); setBounds(19157, 0, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(19158, 0, 22, 3, Interface); setBounds(19158, 0, 242, 4, Interface); setBounds(19159, 4, 246, 5, Interface); setBounds(19160, 0, 24, 6, Interface); Interface = addTabInterface(19160); Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.height = 218; Interface.width = 174; setChildren(105, Interface); addText(19161, "Special Event", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addText(19162, "None", 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 1, 0xFFFFFF); addText(19163, "Special Quest", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addText(19164, "None", 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 1, 0xFFFFFF); setBounds(19161, 4, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(19162, 8, 20, 1, Interface); setBounds(19163, 4, 35, 2, Interface); setBounds(19164, 8, 51, 3, Interface); setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface); int Y = 83; int frame = 5; for(int i = 16026; i <= 16125;i++){ addText(i, ""+i, 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 0, 0xFFFFFF); setBounds(i, 8, Y, frame, Interface); frame++; Y += 15; Y++; } }

  3. search “questTab(rsFonts);” without the quotes and remove it (there is 2 of them be sure to remove both)

  4. search “information” until you find this [code] addText(27624, “Information:”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52,

TDA, 2);[/code]

remove it

4.compile and all crap in quest tab is now gone

This is my first tut i made this because before i figured this out i searched google forever and there was nothing on it so if someone has already made this and needs credits let me know. If this helped you in anyway some rep++ would be nice XD

Read full topic
item.source: Removeing the Lost legacy quest tab
